body: Hi Morgan! Just wanted to welcome you to the team. I'm Renata, the team's senior architect, and I'll be your manager for the summer. I'm excited to have you aboard, I think you'll really enjoy the work we do here.
It's so nice to meet you Renata! I'm so excited to be here. If there's anything I can get started on right away please let me know!
I LOVE the enthusiasm -- I will talk to Tom (one of our senior software engineers) today and will figure out what we can get you started on for tomorrow.

For today, can you work your way through all of the onboarding, HR, and cybersecurity training courses? I'll put in some access requests for you in the meantime, and then we can meet later today to more properly introduce ourselves and discuss your interests and goals. Does that sound good to you?
Yes, that sounds great, thank you so much! I'll get started on those training courses right away. I'm pretty sure they're the exact same ones that I did last year for my first internship here hahaha.
Awesome, I just sent you an invite for us to meeting this afternoon. Talk to you later today!
